card: I can still see but I need to wear a mask.
I can still see but not clean enough to drive.
I can barely see. Too dangerous to go out.

condition.title: Light Disturbance
condition.subtitle: Small Road Cracks, Few Obstacles, Partial Access

condition.title: Moderate Disturbance
condition.subtitle: Large Road Cracks, Partially Blocked, Limited Access

condition.title: Heavy Disturbance
condition.subtitle: Destroyed Road, Completely Blocked, No access

structure.title: Observed Shaking
structure.subtitle: Movement of household items and decorations at home; felt shaking

evacuationnumber.description: Number of people in your village

symptoms.title: Medium Disruption
symptoms.subtitle: Road blockages, felled trees, agricultural damage, blackout

symptoms.title: High Disruption
symptoms.subtitle: Damage to property, large debris flying around

symptoms.title: Medium
symptoms.subtitle: Waves causing low to medium flooding to coastal communities

card.roaddescription: Ex: Roads are impossible to use since there are huge cracks on the road due to the earthquake.
card.structuredescription: Ex: There is visible cracks on the wall due to the earthquake.
card.volcanodescription: Ex: I can hear rumbling sounds. Possibly from volcanic eruption.
card.smogdescription: Ex: Ash in the area. Zero visibility while driving
card.winddescription: Ex: Leaves are flying around due to the strong winds from the typhoon.
card.stormdescription: Ex: Waves are starting to enter the coastal community due to the typhoon.

thank.subscribeText: Thank you for subscribing! We will send a notification when there is a report in your selected region. To unsubscribe, type “unsubscribe”.

card.subscribedRegionsHeader: You're Already Subscribed to This Location
card.subscribedRegionsBody: Notifications are currently active for the following location(s):
card.subscribedRegionsFooter: To subscribe to a different region, select only the new location you would like to receive notifications for. Please note that you cannot subscribe to the same location more than once.

card.reportAgainAccess: Would you also like to submit road accessibility report?

card.reportAgainSmog: Would you like to submit ashfall report?

partner_mode_body1: Anyone can submit a disaster report to Makalamidad.ph
partner_mode_body2: To submit an anonymous disaster report, skip this step!
partner_mode_body3: To submit a report as a partner organization, enter your code below
partner_mode_loginSubHeader: You are submitting a report as:
partner_mode_partnerNotfound: Partner code not found or in inactive status , Kindly check your partner code or email us at bayanihan@mapakalamidad.ph
forgot_partner_body: Hi Makalamidad.ph My name is [enter your name] from [enter your organization]. I have forgotten my partner code and/or I would like to gain access to a Partner Code to be able to report disasters as an official partner representative of Makalamidad.ph ,Thank you.
